Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Livingston to impose an additional one percent sales tax
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Livingston to impose an additional one percent sales tax from November 30, 2020 until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Livingston to impose an additional one percent sales tax
